sentences.en: ...a tropical tree that is bled regularly for its resin.
sentences.cn: …定期被采割树脂的一棵热带树。

sentences.en: Birefringence of the cured resin was measured with a senarmont compensator.
sentences.cn: 用塞拿蒙补偿器测定固化树脂的双折射率.
二乙烯三胺将使树脂膨胀.

sentences.en: Excess resin is suspended in the crude homogenate.
sentences.cn: 过量的树脂悬浮于粗匀浆中.

sentences.en: From three o'clock onward they would be burning resin.
sentences.cn: 从3点钟以后,它们就燃烧着松香.

sentences.en: Opacity is due to crazes in the resin.
sentences.cn: 不透明是因树脂中产生裂纹.

sentences.en: The first response to diffused water is resin swelling.
sentences.cn: 首先受到扩散水影响的是树脂溶胀.

sentences.en: The organo functional groups will react with the resin.
sentences.cn: 有机官能团将与树脂反应.

sentences.en: The resin from which the oil is extracted comes from a small, tough tree.
sentences.cn: 用于提取这种油的树脂取自于一种矮小坚韧的树。

sentences.en: The resin moves intermittently down and out of the bed.
sentences.cn: 树脂周期地向下移动和移出床层.

sentences.en: This allyl type resin is a highly transparent, colourless material.
sentences.cn: 这种烯丙基型的树脂是一种高度透明的 、 无色材料.

sentences.en: This is a hot - setting resin.
This is referred to as a thixotropic property of the resin.
sentences.cn: 这种特性叫做树脂的触变性.

sentences.en: Two of the lorries, carrying industrial resin and paint thinner, burst into flames.
sentences.cn: 其中运载工业树脂和涂料稀释剂的两辆卡车起火了。

words.tran_cn: 用树脂处理；将树脂渗入

phrases.tran_cn: 丙烯酸树脂；压克力树脂
离子交换树脂（多孔合成树脂的总称）

trans.tran_en: a thick sticky liquid that comes out of some trees
